Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aparthotel Costa Mar in Tias (Puerto del Carmen), you'll be minutes from Pocillos Beach and close to Rancho Texas Park. This beach aparthotel is within close proximity of Lanzarote Golf Resort and Puerto del Carmen Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 183 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes. Rooms have private patios. Conveniences include safes and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a garden. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Aparthotel Costa Mar. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and laundry facilities.
